column4: what can be the reason that I can't connect to 127.0.0.1:16001 ?
maybe you don't have a service running on port 16001?
drop into the command line and try "telnet 127.0.0.1 16001"
while you are on the command line do "netstat -tulanp | grep 16001"
what about the netstat command, anything returned?
what about the command "netstat -tulanp | 16001"
copy and paste that command
sorry "netstat -tulanp | grep 16001"
it's late :)
what does "netstat -tulanp | grep 16001" return?
then you don't have anything running on that port
I have no idea what service you are trying to run
I don't read dutch
no
nothing to do with a static IP. Believe me, 127.0.0.1 is as static as it gets
whatever script ytou are running is not starting a service on that port
